languages.text: {n}Банда головорезов-гладиаторов, гордо носящих имя Ревущие, смотрит на вас с ужасом и подобострастием. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Пятна крови Злобы на полу{/d} никто не смеет отмывать — они служат символом вашего статуса.{/n}

{n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Банда головорезов-гладиаторов, гордо носящих имя Ревущие, смотрит на вас с ужасом и подобострастием. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Пятна крови Злобы на полу{/d} никто не смеет отмывать — они служат символом вашего статуса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe Malice's blood off the floor — it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

{n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

{n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

languages.text: {n}シュリーカーと呼ばれる熾烈な剣闘士の一団は、恐怖と卑屈さの中であなたを見つめている。誰も{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}マリスの血{/d}を拭おうとはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}シュリーカーと呼ばれる熾烈な剣闘士の一団は、恐怖と卑屈さの中であなたを見つめている。誰も{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}マリスの血{/d}を拭おうとはしない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一群被称为“尖啸者”的凶狠角斗士盯着你，目光中充满了恐惧与谄媚的意味。没人敢把地板上{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}恶棍的鲜血{/d}擦掉，因为这滩鲜血象征着你尊崇的地位。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一群被称为“尖啸者”的凶狠角斗士盯着你，目光中充满了恐惧与谄媚的意味。没人敢把地板上恶棍的鲜血擦掉，因为这滩鲜血象征着你尊崇的地位。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La banda de despiadados gladiadores conocidos como los Aulladores te miran aterrorizados y sumisos. Nadie se atreve a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}limpiar la sangre de Malicia{/d} del suelo. Es señal de tu estatus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La banda de despiadados gladiadores conocidos como los Aulladores te miran aterrorizados y sumisos. Nadie se atreve a limpiar la sangre de Malicia del suelo. Es señal de tu estatus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Bande von gnadenlosen Gladiatoren, die sich die Kreischer nennen, starrt dich verängstigt und unterwürfig an. Niemand wagt es, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Tückes Blut{/d} vom Boden zu wischen. Es ist ein Symbol deines Status.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Bande von gnadenlosen Gladiatoren, die sich die Kreischer nennen, starrt dich verängstigt und unterwürfig an. Niemand wagt es, Tückes Blut vom Boden zu wischen. Es ist ein Symbol deines Status.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La bande de gladiateurs connus sous le nom des Hurleurs vous dévisage avec autant de terreur que d'obséquiosité. Personne n'ose s'atteler à nettoyer le {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}sang de Malice{/d} qui tapisse le sol : c'est le symbole même de votre statut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La bande de gladiateurs connus sous le nom des Hurleurs vous dévisage avec autant de terreur que d'obséquiosité. Personne n'ose s'atteler à nettoyer le sang de Malice qui tapisse le sol : c'est le symbole même de votre statut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çığırtkanlar olarak bilinen insafsız gladyatör çetesi, dehşet içinde ve dalkavukça seni izliyor. Kimse, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Melanet'in yerdeki kanını{/d} silmeye cüret edemiyor. Bu durum, onların gözündeki mevkinin bir simgesi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gang of cutthroat gladiators known as the Shriekers stare at you in terror and obsequiousness. No one dares to wipe {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Malice's blood{/d} off the floor: it is a symbol of your status.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Çığırtkanlar diye bilinen insafsız gladyatör çetesi, dehşet içinde ve dalkavukça dik dik sana bakıyor. Kimse, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_AngerDead}Melanet'in yerdeki kanını{/d} silmeye cüret edemiyor: Bu, itibarının bir simgesi.{/n}
